creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: interior scene; standing male figure wearing white underwear, looking down at a naked seated man in a chair; two shaded windows with daylight streaming in; yellow rug on a hardwood floors; television on left edge with red cloth draped over it; small cat walking around the edge of a wall, heading into another room with a closet with shirt hanging on a hanger; shoes on the floor of the closet; brown paper bag on the closet floor; police uniform hat on the top shelf of the closet

title: Blue Uniform
